Text.Page:
I keep hearing good things about you, .

I'm even hearing that your success has inspired several new archer recruits to undertake the tasks you've been doing.

I take it you're ready for your next task?"Yes, I'm ready."

Let's see...you're ready for the...fourth task? Yes.

I'm sure it'll come as no surprise that you need to clear two dungeons again...or the same dungeon, two times. As usual, keep in mind that these dungeons might be more than you can handle alone."I'm ready."

I'm very proud of your progress, .

I'm looking forward to seeing how you do with the next task."Same here."
